title: Pilot
description: S.H.I.E.L.D. puts together a special team, led by Agent Phil Coulson, to track down a mysterious man with special abilities and the young computer hacker that's encouraging him to reveal himself to the world.
While extracting a strange object out of Peru, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents are taken hostage aboard their plane.

title: The Asset
description: Dr. Franklin Hall has been kidnapped. Coulson and his team are assigned to rescue him.

title: Eye Spy
description: The team tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing valuable information.

title: Girl in the Flower Dress
description: Centipede kidnaps another gifted man. S.H.I.E.L.D. tries to track them down. Also, secrets about Skye are revealed.

title: FZZT
description: Simmons becomes infected with an alien virus after exposing herself to a group of people that have come into contact with a Chitauri helmet.

title: The Hub
description: Ward and Fitz are sent on a classified mission in South Ossetia.

title: The Well
description: Ward becomes exposed to a piece of an Asgardian staff, which causes his worst memory to resurface.

title: Repairs
description: The agents investigate the strange occurrences of a woman who, they believe, has telekinetic powers.

title: The Bridge
description: S.H.I.E.L.D. receives assistance from Mike Peterson as they take on Centipede once again.

title: The Magical Place
description: S.H.I.E.L.D. organizes a full scale hunt for Coulson. Centipede tries to resurface the memories on what happened after Coulson died.

title: Seeds
description: While investigating a problem at S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy, Coulson and May turn up unexpected information about Skye's parents.

title: T.R.A.C.K.S.
description: The team tries to confiscate an important device on a train, but when one agent takes a very risky move that backfires, the entire team is affected.

title: T.A.H.I.T.I.
description: Coulson and the team rush to Bethesda in an attempt to save Skye's life.

title: Yes Men
description: While Skye recovers, Lady Sif arrives with need of assistance in capturing an escaped Asgardian prisoner, named Lorelei.

title: End of the Beginning
description: Agent Garett and Triplett have returned to assist Coulson's team hunt down S.H.I.E.L.D.'s devious nemesis--the Clairvoyant. But will Deathlok kill them all to guard his master's identity?

title: Turn, Turn, Turn
description: S.H.I.E.L.D. has been compromised by an old enemy. The team doesn't know whom to trust.

title: Providence
description: With Colonel Glenn Talbot now on their trail, Coulson and his team seek refuge in the last place anyone would look, where they begin to uncover S.H.I.E.L.D.'S most dangerous secrets -- secrets that could destroy them all.

title: The Only Light in the Darkness
description: Agent Koenig puts the team through the ultimate lie detector test and Coulson races to protect an old flame from an old enemy.

title: Nothing Personal
description: Just when there's no one left to trust, Agent Maria Hill returns to team up with Coulson as S.H.I.E.L.D. is being destroyed around them.

title: Ragtag
description: Ward's betrayal and HYDRA's shocking secrets are revealed as Coulson's team goes undercover on a mission that leaves no one unscathed.

title: Beginning of the End
description: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of HYDRA.

title: Shadows
description: Carl Creel is sent after an item that was stolen from Hydra during WWII. Fitz tries to cope with his mental issues.

title: Heavy Is the Head
description: Hunter gets captured by General Talbot. May goes after Creel and the Obelisk.

title: Making Friends and Influencing People
description: Simmons is forced to help Hydra capture Donnie Gill. S.H.I.E.L.D. tries to get to him first.

title: Face My Enemy
description: When May gets kidnapped, Hydra sends out an impersonator to lure Coulson into a trap. Fitz tries to find the confidence to join the rest of the team in their social activities.

title: A Hen in the Wolf House
description: Raina threatens to expose Simmons to Hydra unless Coulson hands Skye over to her father.

title: A Fractured House
description: The world turns against S.H.I.E.L.D. when Hydra impersonates them to attack The United Nations, and an unexpected enemy leads the charge to bring about their downfall.

title: The Writing on the Wall
description: A mysterious man is killing off former S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and carving the same markings as Coulson. Coulson tries to track him down. Meanwhile, May leads a team on a manhunt for Ward.

title: The Things We Bury
description: Coulson and team find themselves in an epic face-off against Hydra to uncover an ancient secret, while Ward kidnaps his brother, Senator Christian Ward, for a violent trip down memory lane.

title: Ye Who Enter Here
description: While Coulson's team tries to find the entrance to the mysterious alien city, the rest of the agents try to rescue Raina when they find out that Hydra is after her.

title: What They Become
description: Whitehall and Coulson's forces take part in an explosive confrontation that changes everyone. Skye uncovers some truths about her past.

title: Aftershocks
description: Coulson and the team are faced with the consequences of the war with Hydra. As revelations threaten to destroy them, Hydra makes a move.

title: Who You Really Are
description: Coulson and the team help a confused Lady Sif, who has lost her memory after a battle with a mysterious warrior.

title: One of Us
description: Cal wants vengeance, so he rallies a team of super villains to crush S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, May turns to her ex-husband, Dr. Andrew Garner, to help with a crisis threatening the harmony of the team.

title: Love in the Time of Hydra
description: The team are bewildered by a recent shocking revelation as they face a difficult decision. Meanwhile, Bobbi and Mack declare their loyalty to Hunter; and Ward and Agent 33 take care of a private matter.

title: One Door Closes
description: War comes to Coulson's doorstep in a way he never anticipated as shocking revelations are brought to light, and Skye struggles to control her new abilities but will soon make a decision that irrevocably changes her life.

title: Afterlife
description: As Robert Gonzalez makes his move, Coulson must do whatever it takes to protect the future of S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile Skye's journey to control her powers take a surprising turn when she meets the enigmatic Inhuman named Lincoln.

title: Melinda
description: The story of May’s transformation into “The Cavalry” is revealed. As Skye learns more about her heritage, the truth will send her in a new direction.

title: Frenemy of My Enemy
description: A dangerous new alliance is formed as Coulson and Hunter turn to the last person anyone would expect, Grant Ward! As the war between S.H.I.E.L.D. factions continues, Skye and Lincoln will find themselves drawn into this conflict.

title: The Dirty Half Dozen
description: Gonzales and Coulson must find a way to put their differences aside and work together against HYDRA, even if it means teaming up with someone they don't trust.

title: Scars
description: As tensions rise between S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Inhumans, Skye finds herself torn between the groups; Coulson reveals a secret.

title: S.O.S. Part 1
description: S.H.I.E.L.D puts everything on the line to survive a war that blurs the line between friend and foe. Coulson and his team will be forced to make shocking sacrifices that will leave their relationships and their world changed forever.

title: S.O.S. Part 2
description: The battle between SHIELD and the Inhumans reaches its peak. SHIELD must defend their own and keep Skye safe.

title: Laws of Nature
description: Director Phil Coulson and Agent Daisy Johnson leading the charge as S.H.I.E.L.D. searches the world for more powered people in the aftermath of their epic battle with Jiaying and her army of Inhumans. However, Coulson and the team soon find out that they are not the only group looking for these new Inhumans.

title: Purpose in the Machine
description: Fitz and the team enlist the aid of an Asgardian to unlock the secrets of the ancient monolith that swallowed Simmons, and Agent May is at a crossroads in her personal and professional life.

title: A Wanted (Inhu)Man
description: Mack, Daisy, and Coulson race against time to keep Lincoln safe; Hunter will do whatever it takes to get revenge.

title: Devils You Know
description: Having reluctantly agreed to share information with Rosalind and the ATCU, Coulson and the team search for the Inhuman who is killing other Inhumans; May feels that Hunter's mission to take down Ward is getting too personal.

title: 4,722 Hours
description: After her dramatic rescue from another planet, Simmons is still reeling from her ordeal and reveals how she had to fight for her life in a harsh new world.

title: Among Us Hide...
description: The stakes get higher as May and Hunter pursue Ward and Hydra; Coulson thinks the ATCU could be keeping a big secret.

title: Chaos Theory
description: As Daisy and the team try to protect Inhumans, a shocking truth is revealed about S.H.I.E.L.D.'s biggest enemy; with Fitz's help, Simmons recovers information that could get them back through the portal.

title: Many Heads, One Tale
description: Dangerous facts about the ATCU are discovered by the team; Ward's plans to take down S.H.I.E.L.D. do not go as expected.

title: Closure
description: Ward's vendetta and plan for revenge against S.H.I.E.L.D. brings the team to their knees, and Coulson proves he will be willing to do anything to settle the conflict.

title: Maveth
description: S.H.I.E.L.D battles Hydra head-to-head, which sees Coulson and Fitz take the ultimate risk while Daisy and the Inhumans try to keep Hydra at bay.

title: Bouncing Back
description: Threats loom as the team tries to take down Hydra.

title: The Inside Man
description: Coulson and the team investigate an international conference on the fate of the Inhumans. Back on the bus, Fitzsimmons may have found a way to stop the Inhuman gene from spreading.

title: Parting Shot
description: After tracking Malick to Russia, Bobbi and Hunter become involved in an assassination plot; the team is changed forever as they race to save lives in the balance.

title: Watchdogs
description: Agent Mack and his brother step in when a radical group called the Watchdogs plan to eliminate the Inhumans; Simmons finds a powerful chemical compound.

title: Spacetime
description: When Daisy gets a horrifying glimpse of the future, S.H.I.E.L.D. races to prove that fate is not fixed.

title: Paradise Lost
description: The team hunts for information on a new enemy; Malick's secret from his past threatens to destroy his Hydra legacy.

title: The Team
description: Agent Daisy Johnson must call upon the Secret Warriors for an inaugural mission that will leave no member unscathed, and S.H.I.E.L.D. learns more about Hive's powers, forcing them to question everyone they trust.

title: The Singularity
description: The S.H.I.E.L.D. team is left reeling and decimated as Hive continues to sway Inhumans to his side. But there is a sliver of hope as Agents Fitz and Simmons follow a lead that may be able to stop the maniacal Inhuman once and for all.

title: Failed Experiments
description: As the threat of Hive looms, loyalties are put to the test and the team must come up with a decisive resolution.

title: Emancipation
description: Daisy's prophecy ticks closer towards a major loss, as the aftermath of the events of "Marvel's Captain America: Civil War" force S.H.I.E.L.D. to register the Inhumans.

title: Absolution
description: It's a showdown a season in the making as S.H.I.E.L.D. takes on Hive, and when his master plan is finally revealed, the team must spring into action.

title: Ascension
description: In the conclusion to "Absolution," S.H.I.E.L.D. must spring into action to combat Hive.

title: Ghost Rider: The Ghost
description: Daisy has left S.H.I.E.L.D. and is trying to solve the mystery of a bunch of serial killings in the Los Angeles area. At the same time her old friends suspect her for the killings and are following her trail in an attempt to find her.

title: Ghost Rider: Meet the New Boss
description: Daisy goes to battle Ghost Rider at a terrible cost, and Coulson faces the new director, whose bold agenda surprises them all.

title: Ghost Rider: Uprising
description: Coulson, Mack and Fitz try to locate and neutralize a rogue group looking to stop Inhuman registration worldwide; Simmons and Dr. Radcliffe have only a short time to save May before she succumbs to her illness.

title: Ghost Rider: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
description: As Ghost Rider's quest for vengeance brings him into an explosive confrontation with S.H.I.E.L.D., Coulson and Mack must rely on an unlikely ally in their time of desperate need; and Daisy reunites with a familiar face to stop the Watchdogs.

title: Ghost Rider: Lockup
description: As Robbie Reyes struggles to control The Ghost Rider, S.H.I.E.L.D. infiltrates a high-security prison to unravel the secrets that haunt them all.

title: The Good Samaritan
description: The shocking origin story of Robbie's transition into Ghost Rider is revealed as the lives of Coulson and the team hang in the balance.

title: Ghost Rider: Deals with Our Devils
description: With the loss of half the team, the remaining members search for answers as the clock counts down for Ghost Rider.

title: Ghost Rider: The Laws of Inferno Dynamics
description: With the lives of everyone in Los Angeles hanging in the balance, S.H.I.E.L.D. and Ghost Rider find themselves working together.

title: Broken Promises
description: Though Coulson and May are growing closer, Coulson remains unaware of the dark secret May is hiding beneath the surface. Meanwhile, Aida is unrelenting in her search for the Darkhold.

title: The Patriot
description: Separated from their team, Coulson and Mack discover a shocking secret about Mace, leaving all of S.H.I.E.L.D. in a precarious position.

title: Wake Up
description: May works to uncover the truth about what happened to her; Aida's next move puts everyone's life at risk.

title: Hot Potato Soup
description: Dr. Radcliffe goes after the Koenig family to find the location of the Darkhold. The Superior reveals his plans to Radcliffe.

title: BOOM
description: An explosive Inhuman surfaces and the team are tasked with containing it. Elsewhere: Coulson and Mack encounter Radcliffe's inspiration for Aida.

title: The Man Behind the Shield
description: Coulson and the team engage in a deadly cat-and-mouse game as they work to rescue Director Mace, who is fighting for his life.

title: Self Control
description: As Radcliffe and Aida's plan goes into action, Fitz and Simmons are trapped in the Playground unsure of which of their friends are real and which ones have been replaced by LMDs.

title: What If...
description: Daisy and Simmons uncover secrets and lies in a world gone mad. With Hydra in control, they are our only hope to save everyone.

title: Identity and Change
description: As Daisy and Simmons struggle to discover an escape route to the real world, the identity of the Inhuman leader of the Resistance is revealed.

title: No Regrets
description: The truth behind Fitz's turn threatens to bring down all of S.H.I.E.L.D.

title: All the Madame's Men
description: Daisy teams up with an unlikely partner; Aida prepares to put her endgame into effect.

title: Farewell, Cruel World!
description: The clock is ticking for Daisy and Simmons to get the team out of the Framework, but not everyone is ready and willing to leave.

title: The Return
description: Coulson and the team's victory in the Framework is short-lived, as an even deadlier enemy looms against them all.

title: World's End
description: With the surprising emergence of Ghost Rider, Coulson and the team attempt to stop Aida from ending the world.

title: Orientation: Part 1
description: Coulson and the team find themselves trapped on a mysterious ship in outer space, and that's just the beginning of the nightmare to come.

title: Orientation: Part 2
description: Coulson and the team find themselves stranded on a mysterious ship in outer space, and that's just the beginning of the nightmare to come.

title: A Life Spent
description: Daisy decides she will rescue Simmons, even though she must risk everything.

title: A Life Earned
description: Coulson and the team discover their captors' true intentions.

title: Rewind
description: With the help of Lance Hunter, nothing will stop Fitz from finding his lost team as his secret journey is revealed.

title: Fun & Games
description: With Daisy's life on the line, an unexpected friend attempts to rescue her.

title: Together or Not at All
description: Just as the team reunites, they become prey to an undefeated Kree warrior bent on killing them all.

title: The Last Day
description: Coulson and the team discover that the most unexpected person from S.H.I.E.L.D.'s past may hold the key to stopping Earth's destruction.

title: Best Laid Plans
description: Mack, Yo-Yo and Flint fight to keep everyone alive by starting a revolution against the Kree.

title: Past Life
description: The team has one final chance to return to their timeline, but their actions may have deadly consequences.

title: All the Comforts of Home
description: Coulson and his team are out to rewrite the fate of humanity but they are unaware how the changes will affect one S.H.I.E.L.D. agent's life.

title: The Real Deal
description: Coulson finally reveals the mysterious deal he made with Ghost Rider, which will impact everyone on the team.

title: Principia
description: The team goes in search of Gravitonium in order to save the world.

title: The Devil Complex
description: Fitz and Simmons are faced with one of their greatest fears as they search for a way to seal the rift.

title: Rise and Shine
description: Coulson uncovers General Hale's real agenda and it could be the end of the world if S.H.I.E.L.D. can't help her.

title: Inside Voices
description: Coulson is forced to team up with unlikely allies to save the world, while his team try to track him down and rescue him.

title: The Honeymoon
description: When an agents life hangs in the balance, Fitz, Simmons and Yo-Yo attempt to neutralise a weapon that could play a role in Earth's destruction.

title: All Roads Lead...
description: The team must find a way to stop Ruby before the prophesied chain reaction that can destroy the earth is put into motion.

title: Option Two
description: The team finds themselves trapped and under siege at the Lighthouse.

title: The One Who Will Save Us All
description: A newly determined Talbot takes Coulson to meet the enemy and attempts to avert Earth's destruction.

title: The Force of Gravity
description: Daisy's future as the destroyer of worlds could take a critical change.

title: The End
description: The team must choose between Coulson's life or death; the wrong decision will cause the destruction of Earth.

title: Missing Pieces
description: Scattered across the galaxy, the team works to find their footing in the wake of losing Coulson.

title: Window of Opportunity
description: While Fitz and Enoch struggle in space, Sarge and his team move forward with their mysterious mission on Earth.

title: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
description: While Fitz and Enoch try their luck at the casino, Daisy and Simmons find themselves in a much more exciting situation.

title: Code Yellow
description: Yo-Yo and Keller take things public; parasitic aliens threaten the human race; and someone really needs boba.

title: The Other Thing
description: Sarge has May; Altarah has Daisy, Enoch and Simmons; and now, there are two planets that need saving.

title: Inescapable
description: Fitz and Simmons have fought through space, time and alternate realities to find each other, and now, closer than ever, only their own demons can stop their mission.

title: Toldja
description: After finding themselves in yet another gambling dilemma, a mysterious stranger offers Enoch and FitzSimmons a ride home.

title: Collision Course (Part I)
description: To face The Galaxy-Hopping Hate-Beast That Eats Planets, the team on Earth asks for help in all the wrong places; while back on the Lazy Comet, something weird goes on with Izel's crew.

title: Collision Course (Part II)
description: There's no time for the team to play catch-up when there's a planet to save.

title: Leap
description: The team must trust each other in order to face impending doom and an enemy that's closer than they think.

title: From the Ashes
description: Out of answers and running out of time, the agents must face the ghosts of their past to move forward.

title: The Sign
description: With time running short, the team has to go to hell to stop the end of everything.

title: New Life
description: With time running short, the team has to go to hell to stop the end of everything.

title: The New Deal
description: Coulson and the agents are thrust backwards in time and stranded in 1931 New York City; with an all-new Zephyr set to time-jump at any moment, the team must hurry to find out exactly what happened.

title: Know Your Onions
description: With the identity of the timeline-unraveling "thread" revealed, the team's mission to protect him at all costs leads each agent to question their own values.

title: Alien Commies from the Future!
description: A surprise leap forward in time.

title: Out of the Past
description: Agent Phil Coulson comes to a realization about the importance of July 22, 1955, in the S.H.I.E.L.D. history books.

title: A Trout in the Milk
description: The team - Daniel Sousa in tow - reunites with more than one familiar face at the S.H.I.E.L.D. hangout and discovers exactly how to dismantle the Chronicoms' latest plan; the Zephyr unexpectedly leaps forward again.

title: Adapt or Die
description: The team scrambles to rescue Mack's parents.

title: The Totally Excellent Adventures of Mack and the D
description: After getting stranded in 1982, Mack retreats to his childhood home to deal with the death of his parents; Deke scouts a group of new agents.

title: After, Before
description: With the Zephyr's time drive malfunctioning, the team hurtle toward disaster with Yo-Yo as its only hope; Yo-Yo must enlist the help of an old adversary to regain her powers.

title: As I Have Always Been
description: A time storm ravages the Zephyr, propelling it toward destruction while simultaneously forcing Daisy and Coulson to relive their failed attempts to save the team.

title: Stolen
description: The team arrives back in 1983, where Nathaniel and Kora are hard at work building an army; Daisy is tasked with protecting Jiaying; the others learn they'll need to face another supercharged enemy to stop Malick.

title: Brand New Day
description: With help from Kora on the inside, Sibyl and Nathanial continue their fight to shape a dark new future for S.H.I.E.L.D., managing to stay one step ahead of the agents along the way.

title: The End is at Hand
description: Sibyl attempts to get the location of Fitz from Jemma's memories. Meanwhile, the SHIELD team attempts to stop Nathaniel's plans for anarchy and the Chronicoms' attempts to rewrite history.

title: What We're Fighting For
description: The final fight against the Chronicoms begins. A familiar face returns.
